00016                 "layerID: " << layerID_ << ", " <<
00017                 "position: ( " << x_ << ", " << y_ << ", " << z_ << " ), " <<

00020                 "momentum: ( " << px_ << ", " << py_ << ", " << pz_ << " )" <<
